Description: Round-topped limestone stela divided into three registers: 1 - Three rows of Hieroglyphic text. 2 - Representations of nine figures sniffing lotus-flowers. 3 - Eleven columns of mixed Hieroglyphic and Hieratic text.
Bibliographic references: Scott-Moncrieff 1912 / Hieroglyphic texts from Egyptian stelae, etc., in the British Museum, Part 2. (pl.49)
